subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: With the recent death of Steve Montador and the addition of 29 players to a class-action suit against the league, a suit over concussions is gaining momentum.
snippet: With the recent death of Steve Montador and the addition of 29 players to a class-action suit against the league, a suit over concussions is gaining momentum.
